news_header: Sean 'Diddy' Combs faces seven new civil lawsuits alleging sexual assault, drugging, and other crimes, while he awaits trial for federal charges of sex trafficking and racketeering.
news_text: Seven new civil lawsuits have been filed against Sean 'Diddy' Combs in New York, with four men and three women accusing him of sexual assault at various parties. The youngest plaintiff was 13 at the time of the alleged incident. Combs is currently in custody facing federal charges of sex trafficking and racketeering, which he denies. His lawyers have dismissed the lawsuits as publicity stunts. The allegations include drugging victims, rape, and other forms of sexual assault. Combs is awaiting trial set for May 2025 and has pleaded not guilty to all charges.
